data.shortDescription: A decorative wall mirror that can be used as an accent in a contemporary living room.
A modern wall mirror that can be used to open up your living room space.
A plush, soft area rug that features cool contemporary colors in a striped pattern to complement your living room decor.
A stylish hand-crafted accent rug that features a pointed braided texture to accent your living space in a warm, welcoming way.
A modern decorative rug that features a leaf pattern surrounded by warm tones, highlights, and accents.
